title: [Kharam-Dzu, Bazaar SE]
description: A canvas awning stands above the open archway of The Mother Lode, as anonymous figures stroll into and out of the Inn.  Standing nonchalantly to one side of the arch, a group of well-dressed giants banters amiably back and forth.

A green canvas awning shades the open archway of The Mother Lode, casting its shadow over anonymous figures as they stroll into and out of the Inn.  Standing nonchalantly to one side of the arch, a group of well-dressed giants banters amiably back and forth.
